arts.ttl: Barcelona vs PSG – Hakimi clearly announces his objectives
arts.sum: Achraf Hakimi, the 26-year-old right-back of Paris Saint-Germain (2nd), spoke at a press conference this Tuesday ahead of facing FC Barcelona (12th) at the Estadi Olímpic Lluís Companys tomorrow (kick-off at 9 p.m., CET) for Matchday 2 of the 2025-26 Champions League. arts.ttl: PSG plot 'surprise Barcelona free transfer swoop' next summer
arts.sum: Paris Saint-Germain face FC Barcelona this Wednesday 1st October in the Champions League. And, precisely, the French club are reportedly considering recruiting a player from their rivals for free during the next summer transfer window.

arts.sum: FC Barcelona will be determined to deliver a statement performance when Paris Saint-Germain visit the Lluis Companys Olympic Stadium later today. While it is not a knockout tie, the occasion carries all the intensity and anticipation of a final. arts.sum: In a few hours, one of the most highly anticipated UEFA Champions League matches of the season will get underway as Barcelona take on PSG at Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys.
